item.title: By: Michael McNamara

Mike
item.content:encoded:
Very nice indeed, great job! Looking forward to additional features.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/02/02/wordpress-for-android/#comment-3185">Angelo Mandato</a>.
I think the new comment notification is one of the nicer features of the app.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Angelo Mandato.

I think the new comment notification is one of the nicer features of the app.

item.title: By: Angelo Mandato
item.dc:creator: Angelo Mandato
item.description: Awesome! I've been using wpToGo up until now, it works well except I cannot moderate comments like I can with the WordPress iPhone app.
item.content:encoded: Awesome! I’ve been using wpToGo up until now, it works well except I cannot moderate comments like I can with the WordPress iPhone app.
